backport of #39770
backport of #39794

#### PR description:

In order to avoid issues with EDM files being moved to tape, this PR updates the path of files used in HLT tests (said files have been moved to a TSG area on EOS).

PS. It looks like some of these files were recently moved to tape. This didn't cause any issues centrally (e.g. PR tests), because those same files are saved in the EOS user area of the cmsbot. On the other hand, some of the TSG scripts may now fail locally if only the LFN is specified (as there is no automatic fallback on to the EOS area of the cmsbot when running locally, afaiu).

#### PR validation:

None beyond the validation done for #39770.
